title: Research on structuring of pediatric electronic medical records based on joint extraction using BART

abstract: Electronic Medical Records (EMRs) is the original record of the whole process of hospital diagnosis and treatment, and there exists a large amount of medi-structured and unstructured text, which is inconvenient to be used for subsequent auxiliary …
